newsitem.title: USA: AMBAC qualifies six bond deals for insurance.
newsitem.headline: AMBAC qualifies six bond deals for insurance.

text.p: AMBAC Indemnity Corp said it qualified six bond issues for insurance slated for competitive sale on Thursday.
--Johnson County SD #60, Kan., $10 million of general obligation school building bonds.
--Minnesota Housing Finance $53.6 million of housing bonds.
--Babylon, N.Y., $3.1 million of public improvement bonds.
--Cheektowaga, N.Y., $5 million of various purpose bonds.
--Ulster County, N.Y., $8.9 million of public improvement bonds.
--Munford, Tenn., $1.6 million of water and sewer revenue bonds.
